meanings.sent1: The glass was breakable, so I handled it with care.
meanings.sent2: Be careful with that vase; it's very breakable.
meanings.sent3: I tried to juggle the breakable plates, but they ended up on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt as breakable as the delicate porcelain figurine.
meanings.sent5: The thin ice was so breakable that even a small step caused it to crack.

meanings.sent1: The old toy was breakable, so I didn't play with it roughly.
meanings.sent2: The branches of the tree looked breakable under the weight of the snow.
meanings.sent3: The breakable chair groaned under the weight of the heavy man sitting on it.
meanings.sent4: His patience was as breakable as a fragile glass ornament.
meanings.sent5: The delicate thread was so breakable that it snapped with the slightest tug.
